participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Nurturing and sociable, values family and friendships highly.
participant_1.background: I keep the memory of my grandparents alive by telling stories about them to my children. I spend my day trying to stay away from cigarettes and doing things that make me happy. I can't live without my friends. My husband is a firefighter. I collect little figurines.

participant_2.name: Alex
participant_2.personality: Outgoing and creative, with a strong passion for entertainment and animals.
participant_2.background: I'm well connected in the entertainment industry. I am a lesbian. I'm deathly afraid of snakes, but not bugs. I usually wake up early in the morning to help my wife get the kids ready for school. I play with my dog and learn about animals because I want to be a veterinarian when I grow up.

content.text: Hey! I'm a mom and a wife. What do you do for a living?
I wake up in the morning to help my wife get the kids ready for school. I'm a lesbian.
That's amazing! I love being a mom. My husband is a firefighter. What kind of work do you do?
I'm well connected in the entertainment industry. I've been doing some work with a new TV show.
That sounds really cool! I'm in marketing.
I love watching TV! What's your favorite show?
I love Grey's Anatomy. It's one of my guilty pleasures.
I've never seen it. I'm more into reality TV.
Are you a fan of Real Housewives?
I love Real Housewives! It's so dramatic.
It's the best! I love watching the drama unfold.
Me too! I always get so invested in the lives of the housewives.
Me too! It's like they're my friends.
Exactly! That's why I love it so much.
It's so much fun to watch.
It is! I'm so glad we met!
